name: MatchMania Mini
description:
MatchMania

MatchMania is a fast paced puzzle game were you Match 4+ tiles of the same color.  New colors and power-ups are introduced as you go.  It is game over when your tiles reach the top 2 rows of the board.

This version of MatchMania (MatchMania Mini) was developed over a 2 week period in my HTML5/JavaScript game engine. If you enjoyed the game consider downloading the full version here.

How to Play - Keyboard

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Up to Swap
  • Space to Drop
  • P to Pause

Game Modes

The game has 3 different ways to play;

  • Marathon is the core of the game, 10 levels of difficulty, 7 colors and power-ups.
  • Sprint sees how fast you can clear 100 tiles.
  • Time Trial is all the fun of Marathon but in 3 minutes.

Thanks for playing!
